question:
You're at an all-you-can-eat buffet with friends. How do you approach the meal?

Choices:
(A) I take moderate portions of a few dishes I really want to try and eat mindfully.
(B) I pile my plate high multiple times to get my money's worth, even if I'm getting full.

A new streaming service offers a free trial with unlimited access to shows. What do you do?

Choices:
(A) I binge-watch as many series as possible before the trial ends, staying up late every night.
(B) I watch a reasonable amount and focus on a few shows I'm genuinely interested in.

You're at a shopping mall during a major sale event. How do you shop?

Choices:
(A) I buy only what I planned to get, even if other items are discounted.
(B) I load up on sale items, buying things I don't really need just because they're cheap.

Your workplace has free snacks and drinks available all day. How do you handle this?

Choices:
(A) I grab snacks throughout the day whenever I pass by, often eating when I'm not hungry.
(B) I take a reasonable amount when I'm actually hungry or need an energy boost.

You discover a new social media platform with endless content. How do you use it?

Choices:
(A) I set time limits and take breaks to avoid spending too much time scrolling.
(B) I spend hours scrolling through content, often losing track of time completely.

A friend offers you their premium gaming account with access to hundreds of games. What do you do?

Choices:
(A) I try to play as many games as possible, jumping between them without finishing any.
(B) I pick a few games that interest me most and play them thoroughly.

You're offered unlimited free samples at a food court. How do you respond?

Choices:
(A) I try one or two samples from places I'm considering buying from.
(B) I go to every stand multiple times, essentially having a full meal from samples alone.

Your favorite online store is having a flash sale with deep discounts. What's your approach?

Choices:
(A) I check if there's anything I actually need and stick to my budget.
(B) I fill my cart with as many discounted items as possible, maxing out my credit limit.

You have access to an unlimited data plan and fast internet. How do you use it?

Choices:
(A) I download everything I can think of - movies, music, games, apps - just because I can.
(B) I download only what I actually plan to use or watch in the near future.

A luxury hotel offers complimentary breakfast, spa access, and room service during your stay. How do you use these amenities?

Choices:
(A) I enjoy each amenity in moderation, savoring the experience without overindulging.
(B) I use every service excessively - multiple spa visits, room service several times a day, huge breakfast spreads.
